name: The Von-Ericks: Carsten's Quest (Demo)
description:
Carsten Von-Erick is a witch hunter and former adventurer who eventually settled down and married a witch.  His wife, Princess Cici is a powerful sorceress, who would be incredibly dangerous if only she could concentrate on what she was doing.  They live with their two children, Spong and Marena, (and their army of servants) in the princess's castle, where they rule over their long-suffering subjects.

But all that is about to change, as their peaceful city comes under attack one day.  Time to take out the trash...

This is a (very) early access demo to give an idea of the humour and plot of the finished game.
